articles.author: Michael M. Grynbaum, Katie Robertson
articles.title: How CNN, Fox News and Other TV Networks Are Covering Ukraine - The New York Times
articles.description: Fox News stars like Tucker Carlson questioned why Americans hated Vladimir Putin, and CNN showed Russian tanks and rockets in live war-zone dispatches.
articles.content: Across television news on Thursday, the coverage included haunting overhead shots of the emptied streets of Kyiv, punctuated by the sounds of air raid sirens and occasional explosions. Some correspon… [+3312 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Gambino
articles.title: Biden imposes new sanctions on Russia: ‘America stands up to bullies’ - The Guardian
articles.description: President takes aim at Russia’s largest banks and companies but is emphatic US troops will not engage in conflict in Ukraine
articles.content: Joe Biden on Thursday announced a fresh round of what he said would be crippling sanctions on Russia after its invasion of Ukraine, declaring that Vladimir Putin chose this war and that he and his co… [+5429 chars]

articles.title: The secret of mycorrhizal fungi - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers have found that mycorrhizas promote greater tree species diversity in North American forests.
articles.content: Fungi, specifically those that are “mycorrhizal,” are natural allies of the forest because they improve tree nutrient acquisition. But which of the mycorrhizal feeding strategies yields the greatest … [+5487 chars]
